description: A fifth-generation coal miner from Appalachia tells Trump his plan to loosen regulations on coal-fired plants not only is harmful to the environment, but also bad for the future of the region.
title: Coal Miner to Trump: “Coal Mining Isn’t Coming Back”
title_page: Coal Miner to Trump: “Coal Mining Isn’t Coming Back” - Video - NYTimes.com
text: A fifth-generation coal miner from Appalachia tells Trump his plan to loosen regulations on coal-fired plants not only is harmful to the environment, but also bad for the future of the region.
